learning.supervised.interfaces

Interface NeighborPointsQueryUserInterface

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AdaBoostM2, ANHBNN, CBWkNN, DWHFNN, DWHFNNBoostable, DWKNN, FNN, HFNN, HFNNBoostable, HIKNN, HIKNNBoostable, HIKNNNonDW, HwKNN, HwKNNBoostable, KNN, NHBNN, NWKNN, RRKNN

    public interface NeighborPointsQueryUserInterface
    This interface declares the methods for classification that requires kNN queries. In that case, a single kNN set can be calculated and distributed to all the simultaneously running classifiers that request it, instead of having each classifier calculate it over and over again. Since there are many kNN-based learning methods in this library, this enables the evaluation to achieve a significant speed-up.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      int classify(DataInstance instance, float[] distToTraining, int[] neighborsAmongTraining)
      This method performs classification of the target data point, based on its nearest neighbors and the distances to all the training points, given for reference.
      float[] classifyProbabilistically(DataInstance instance, float[] distToTraining, int[] neighborsAmongTraining)
      This method performs classification of the target data point, based on its nearest neighbors and the distances to all the training points, given for reference.

    • Method Detail

      • classifyProbabilistically

        float[] classifyProbabilistically(DataInstance instance,
                                float[] distToTraining,
                                int[] neighborsAmongTraining)
                                  throws java.lang.Exception
        This method performs classification of the target data point, based on its nearest neighbors and the distances to all the training points, given for reference.
        Parameters:
        instance - DataInstance object that is to be classified.
        distToTraining - float[] representing distances to all training points.
        neighborsAmongTraining - int[] representing the indexes of the k-nearest neighbors among the training data.
        Returns:
        float[] that is the probabilistic classification of the target DataInstance object.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

      • classify

        int classify(DataInstance instance,
           float[] distToTraining,
           int[] neighborsAmongTraining)
             throws java.lang.Exception
        This method performs classification of the target data point, based on its nearest neighbors and the distances to all the training points, given for reference.
        Parameters:
        instance - DataInstance object that is to be classified.
        distToTraining - float[] representing distances to all training points.
        neighborsAmongTraining - int[] representing the indexes of the k-nearest neighbors among the training data.
        Returns:
        Integer that is the classification outcome, the prediction of the class label.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception
